results.name: a(n) = A259708(n,n-1).
link: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300

formula: Empirical: a(n) = 4*a(n-1) - 2*a(n-2) - 6*a(n-3) + 2*a(n-4) + 4*a(n-5) + a(n-6). - _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 10 2015
